back: A diagonal matrix in which the off-diagonal entries are all zero and the diagonal entries are all equal to 1. The $m \times m$ identity matrix is denoted $\mathbf{I}_m$.
The value that minimizes the squared error to the data. For a data set $d_0, d_1, \ldots, d_{N-1}$ the average is \begin{align} \overline{d} = \frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=0}^{N-1} d_i. \end{align}
Collections of measurements, characteristics, or facts about a group.
